com.anotherservice.rest

Class Action

  • Object
    • Handler
      • Action

  • public abstract class Action
extends Handler
    This is the basic Action handler class for the REST service. This class provides methods for handling parameters but does not implement the execute() method. Extend this class in order to implement custom handling of the execute() method.


    See the Parameter class for information on how to use parameters
    See the com.anotherservice.rest package description for sample code

    Author:
    Simon Uyttendaele

      • getReturnDescription

        public String getReturnDescription()

        Returns:
        The action's return value description

      • setReturnDescription

        public void setReturnDescription(String returnDescription)

      • addParameter

        public final void addParameter(Parameter parameter)
        Adds a supported parameter to this action.
        Parameters:
        parameter - The target parameter to add to this action
        Note:
        null parameter is silently ignored

      • getParameters

        public final Collection<Parameter> getParameters()
        Gets the current registered parameters in this action.
        Returns:
        a collection of Parameters registered in this action
        Note:
        the list of parameters returned is a shallow copy, so adding/removing elements against that list will not affect the action. However, modifying the parameters themselves will be repercuted. If you wish to add parameters to this action, you should use the addParameter() and removeParameter() methods.

      • getParameter

        public final Parameter getParameter(String alias)
        Gets the first parameter for this alias currently registered in this action.
        Parameters:
        alias - the parameter alias
        Returns:
        the first Parameter in this action that has a matching alias. null is returned if none matches

      • getParameter

        public final Parameter getParameter(Collection<String> aliases)
        Gets the first parameter for any of those aliases currently registered in this action.
        Parameters:
        aliases - the list of aliases to check against
        Returns:
        the first Parameter in this action that has a matching alias. null is returned if none matches

      • getParameter

        Gets the first parameter for any of those aliases currently registered in this action.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the first Parameter in this action that has a matching alias. null is returned if none matches

      • hasParameter

        public final boolean hasParameter(String alias)
        Checks whether or not a parameter is registered in this action with the provided alias.
        Parameters:
        alias - the alias of the parameter
        Returns:
        true if a parameter is registered with this alias in this action. false otherwise

      • removeParameter

        public final void removeParameter(String alias)
        Removes the matching parameter from this action.
        Parameters:
        alias - the alias of the parameter to remove
        Note:
        if no parameter is registered with this alias, nothing happens

      • removeParameter

        public final void removeParameter(Collection<String> aliases)
        Removes all the matching parameters from this action.
        Parameters:
        aliases - the list of aliases to remove
        Note:
        • if a parameter is not found for some aliases, nothing happens
        • important : if several parameters registered in this action have the same alias, only the first one is removed

      • removeParameter

        public final void removeParameter(String[] aliases)
        Removes all the matching parameters from this action.
        Parameters:
        aliases - the list of aliases to remove
        Note:
        • if a parameter is not found for some aliases, nothing happens
        • important : if several parameters registered in this action have the same alias, only the first one is removed

      • removeParameter

        public final void removeParameter(Parameter parameter)
        Removes the target parameter from this action.
        Parameters:
        parameter - the parameter to remove
        Note:
        if the parameter is not registered in this action, nothing happens

      • removeAllParameters

        public final void removeAllParameters()
        Removes all parameters from this action.
